title: How-To: Delete Data in Bulk
description:
Covers bulk deletion of data from a repository, typically via delete queries or administrative tools.
This is usually constrained to specific time ranges, tags, or other filters to avoid accidental loss.

examples.name: Delete data by tag and time range (conceptual)
examples.description: Illustrates a guarded delete operation scoped by tag and time; actual syntax depends on admin tooling.
examples.query: DELETE FROM repo WHERE #datasource="test" AND @timestamp < now() - 90d
